name: Black Tea Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Retinol-Alternative BT Matrix
about: What it is: A lightweight antioxidant cream with proven retinol-like performance* BT Matrix for 7x smoother wrinkles, 5x visibly firmer skin & 4x more radiance...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- BT Matrix with Retinol-Like Strength: Diminishes signs of aging..- Ceramide NP: Supports the skin barrier and prevents moisture loss and dehydration..- Squalane: Protects the skin and prevents moisture loss...What Else You Need to Know: This ceramide face moisturizer helps aging skin by reducing the look of deep-set wrinkles while improving visible firmness and radiance. It is powered by BT Matrix, a retinol-like blend proven to support lost skin structure due to a natural decline in collagen & is gentle enough for sensitive skin...Clinical Results: In a self-assessment by scoring, 29 subjects, comparing results from first application to after 8 weeks:.- Seven times visibly smoother wrinkles observed after 8 weeks.- Five times visibly firmer skin observed after 8 weeks.- Four times more radiance observed after 8 weeks..In a self-assessment by scoring, 30 subjects, 4 weeks:.- 31% decreased in look of deep wrinkles observed after 4 weeks.- 64% increase in visibly firmer skin observed after 4 weeks.- 61% increased radiance observed after 4 weeks..In an instrumental test, 32 subjects:.- 154% increase in skin nourishment in just one use..CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -BT Matrix: Is a retinol-like blend shown to support skin structure. .-Ceramide NP: Is a skin-mimicking lipid that supports a strong skin barrier. .-Squalane: Protects skin and prevents moisture loss. ..Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Cocoglycerides, Squalane, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Hydrogenated Coco-glycerides, Jojoba Esters, Propanediol, Polyglycerin-3, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Nephelium Lappaceum Leaf Extract, Alpinia Speciosa Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ceramide NP, Carbomer, Adenosine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Polyacrylate, Maltodextrin, Parfum (Fragrance), Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to the face and neck daily, morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s incredibly expensive, and has a lot of fragrance.  From what I have learned, repeatedly dousing your skin with fragranced products can cause irritation - you might not see signs of irritation, but it is still happening and can interfere with collagen production.  My face is used to active ingredients, so I havenu2019t noticed any effects from the retinol there, but Iu2019ve used it on my neck and see some redness the next day. I donu2019t find it to be particularly moisturizing, though.  I think this would be good for someone just getting started on active ingredients - but be careful in the beginning, itu2019s strong, donu2019t use it every day, see how your skin reacts first.  I probably wonu2019t buy it again, mainly because of the fragrance, but also because there are other products out there that do the same thing but cost a lot less.

reviews.review_title: Unfortunately this made me break out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much because the reviews were great and I liked the smell and texture of this cream. I just turned 40 and decided to try to add this into my routine. I noticed after I started using it, though, I started breaking out.  I convinced myself that maybe it was a purge similar to a retinol purge because of the cell turnover this product causes so I stuck with it, thinking that fresh great skin was within reach, but the breakouts didn't stop. I held on for 13 weeks but never stopped breaking out. I took a few days off, Mt skin cleared up, then I have it one last shot thinking (hoping) maybe it was a purge and I was finally on, I put the lightest bit of this on my skin once it had cleared up again, and by evening I had a fresh pimple. So, if you can use this and not break out, then I'm jealous and stick with it. But if you start breaking out just remember that it's not likely a purge. I don't have particularly sensitive skin, I'm not sure what didn't work for me in this product, but it definitely did not agree with my skin.

reviews.review_title: Overpriced Grease, Posing As A Moisturizer...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My friend got a sample of this & gave it to me because she isn't too big on moisturizers, but serums. This is probably one of the most awful moisturizers I've ever tried. Firstly, you'd think a thick cream like this would coat my dry skinned face nicely right? Wrong. It leaves a thick film that feels exactly like putting grease over your skin. It's absolutely grodie. & NOT worth the $95 dollar price tag when it doesn't even feel luxurious to begin with. Save your money, there's better out there for sure. This feels like I just got done working a 14hr shift at a fast food joint, ew.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this because of how many great reviews it has. Now Iu2019m confused why it has so many great reviews. This moisturizer seems to just absorb into my skin, leaving it dry for the rest of the day. For such an expensive product, Iu2019m really disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Definitely going to keep this in my line up!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! it's not heavy, has a pleasant aroma, you don't need a ton of it each application.  This ( with my other items) leaves my skin feeling so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for about a month now and overall itu2019s a very nourishing product. I love the consistency (not too thin but not too thick) and it has a very refreshing scent. Would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed trying out this night cream! I suffer from super dry skin and this was the perfect cream to combat that. After consistent use I noticed smoother, softer skin, as well as a more even skin tone. I've recommended it to everyone I know!

reviews.review_title: Pricey but great for acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely acne-prone skin. I've finished a course of Accutane, so I'm clear, but I'm still prone to getting cystic pimples if I use something my skin doesn't like. Unfortunately, that's pretty much everything. I really struggle to find a moisturizer for my combo skin that leans towards dry since I use topical tretinoin. I am 30 years old and don't really have fine lines, but I'm starting to get marionette lines. I've been using this product for about 3 weeks, and the lines have become much less noticeable. I use it in the AM, and it provides just the right amount of moisture and does not sit on top of the skin or leave a film. It also smells amazing. I was really hesitant to try this because of the price, but my skin basically exclusively loves Fresh products and doesn't break out on them, so I gave it a try. Fortunately, I only need to use a tiny amount, so I hope the jar will last a long time. I'm not sure why this should be almost $100, but it does work, and I guess I have to buy it since my skin is a total diva.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish the price wasnu2019t so high, I canu2019t deny the efficacy of this cream! My skin is moisturized and smoother. A+++

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is good for your skin and I notice a difference more if I space it apart by a few days. Unfortunately like all products, your skin does get used to it and you don't notice the effects after nightly use. I'm not sure I would rebuy it for the price honestly. It's good but it soaks into the skin and isn't as thick or long-lasting as I thought it might be. I still feel the need to put another moisturizer over the top of it and I have combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample with a sephora purchase (sample size). My skin after a few minutes started burning & irritating my skin. I now have red splotches over a good portion of my face. I don't ever have reactions to skincare like this nor do I have sensitive skin. Combo/dry skin. Mid-40s. It was the only thing different in my routine. Either I'm allergic to something in it or it reacted to something else in my routine. Glad I didn't buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bonne creme mais j'ai trouve plutu00f4t decevant u00e0 ce prix de constater qu'une bulle d'air creait un vide d'environ 25% au centre du pot. D'autres ont eu le mu00eame probleme?  Good cream but I found it rather disappointing at this price that an air bubble created a vacuum of around 25% in the center of the jar. Others had the same problem?

reviews.review_title: A miracle for sensitive combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been dealing with a really bad rosacea outbreak on my face for the last four months. I was ready to give up and accept that my face was always going to be scaly, dry and painful. I decided to try this product as a last ditch effort when I read through some of the reviews and this has truly been a miracle product for me. After using multiple high end brands with no positive results (and sometimes even worse reactions) this is the first product Iu2019ve tried in a long, long time that has completely fixed my outbreak. My skin is the clearest and softest it has been in a very very long time, probably since I was a child. While the price is absolutely insane, this product really really works and I will definitely be saving up to replace it when it runs out. For me, it is absolutely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream ever!!! Iu2019m 46yrs old and this does exactly everything it says it will do. Put it this way. I never buy the same crime twice and Iu2019ve purchased is three times so far. If you can get a sample and try it once youu2019ll see exactly what I mean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have enjoyed Fresh moisturizers for years, but have used different variations for morning and night. But no more, Black Tea Advanced is marvelous. I can feel the difference in my skin within 2 wks. My skin feels firmer, more pliable, and I've got a lovely glow.  My brush on blush cream goes on nicely, unlike the (otherwise nice) Fresh Hyluronic Rose variation where it tends to pill up.  I've been using this one product for both am and pm.  I, however, have not been gifted with the product.  Must be nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the texture and smell of the product; unfortunately I quickly learned itu2019s not for my dry, sensitive skin. My wrinkles were more prominent, and my skin purged terribly (which is odd because I use retinol regularly). Had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing smell, great at making the skin more even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this. Only using it two days but I love the texture of the cream and how it goes on the skin. I can tell by the way it adheres to my skin that itu2019s going to be plumper and more hydrated.   Also the smell is not too heavy! Definitely not overpowering either. Itu2019s a pretty gentle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Fresh. Iu2019m 31 years old and have dry sensitive skin and deep wrinkles on my forehead and interbrow wrinkles. This face moisturizer works to visibly reduce deep set wrinkles while improving skin firmness and radiance.  Really love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm kind of upset by how much I liked this. This is a gorgeous face cream that genuinely makes my skin feel hydrated and nourished. The texture is immaculate. It is the perfect balance between actually being nourishing and being somewhat lightweight and quickly absorbing. It's formulated with nice ingredients, and has a really pretty fresh herbal fragrance. However, at this point in time I wouldn't buy this with my own money. It's a beautiful cream that provides a great experience, but it's not an essential. If my tax bracket changes, I would definitely buy this on my own. I received this complimentary from Fresh (for free) in exchange for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely in love with this product. I live the size of the product as well. This works so well with me I get some many compliments. This is a product I definitely recommend to my family and friends.so happy this was gifted by fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Based on the cost, I was a little sceptical to try this product but I really like their black tea anti-aging mask cream so I thought I would give it a fair shot. Iu2019ve been using it for about a week or so and so far I do really like it generally like the product. I think it is lighter than I thought it would be in terms of texture but it moisturizes well and overall gives me a nice tone in the morning (it is part of my nighttime routine). I think I will have to give it more time to really see the results overall when it comes to the fine lines and wrinkles I have. So far it is a pretty good product but the cost I think is a bit much - however if I continue to use it and it really tackled those fine lines as it claims to do then I think I will repurchase.   Also, it does have a very Flo rally scent so be aware prior to purchasing. I find this creams floral scent is a little stronger than the black tea firming mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of Fresh skincare products and I was delighted to receive this product complimentary from Fresh. First, this smells wonderful. It has kept my skin hydrated all day and it made my skin feel soft and glowing. It's a really wonderful product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this face cream. Iu2019m not sure itu2019s doing anything for my fine lines but it is certainly making my skin smoother and more moisturized than ever before. Highly recommend this lightly scented product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells amazing and feels so nice on my skin. I love everything fresh makes and this is no exception. If you want a nice moisturizer try this one, you wonu2019t regret it. It has a nice tea smell and keeps my skin feeling soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying I would trust fresh with my life! Wearing this overnight has given me such relief from dry winter skin. I wake up with the glow and freshness that I am always looking for! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this moisturizer day and night! It keeps my skin hydrated all through the day and night. Definitely can tell a difference when I donu2019t use it. The only down side is the fragrance so if you have sensitive skin I wouldnu2019t recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Fresh Black Age Renewal Cream complimentary from Fresh and I'm so glad I did because I love what it has done for my skin. It has helped to smooth and nourish my dry skin, and I woke up with a brighter and shinier face. I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this cream smells so good it leaves my skin beautiful, hydrated and soft, i love the packaging and also the ingredients are amazing!  I love that it can be used day and night.  the smell is fine. #gifted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got it as a sample and I just loved it. I really felt my skin tightening and also its thick and not oily. I am gonna order it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product! It was thick without feeling heavy on my face. It was very moisturizing and I woke up feeling like I had dewy skin (in a good way!) I highly suggest this product being added to your skin routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice moisturizer, but thatu2019s about it. Definitely not worth the money. It smells the way it smells because there is fragrance in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This black tea age cream is great for those needing it! Its anti-wrinkle, firm and radiance. It also has a great smell of black tea, After using, you will be able to see the difference in your skin by it getting tighter. Gifted by fresh.

reviews.review_title: The BEST moisturizer that has ever existed!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got a sample of this and usually I use moisturizer samples on my hands, because I have incredibly weird, oily skin that breaks out from everything (sometimes even from a new cleanser)! But, a few weeks ago I had a terrible allergic reaction where my whole face swelled up and after any swelling your skin gets super dry and cracked. Because this was the only moisturizer in the house that I had, I decided to use it (closing my eyes on the fear of breaking out because my skin was in so much pain)... MAGIC!!! I did not break out!!!! Plus to all, it did not irritate my cracked wounds. It doesn't make you oily or greasy, such perfect formula!!!! It isn't sticky, sinks into the skin quickly. You don't feel it on your skin, yet your skin feels good and moisturized. I will definitely be buying the full size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s really moisturizing and for a nighttime cream does not leave my face feeling too greasy or congested. Iu2019ve been using it semiregularly over the last few weeks and have felt a difference in how my skin feels

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with just one use. My skin looks like itu2019s glowing. It goes on nice and smooth. Will definitely add this to my skin care routine. No Piling so thatu2019s a Huge +.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. My skin looks so much nicer after a few weeks of using it daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this, but it has a harsh perfume smell and stings the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very moisturizing, definitely feels refreshing! I love the smell of tea. I like how this doesnu2019t clog my pores. It feels nice and light on the skin. Iu2019m not sure about the anti-aging benefits yet. I would have to see overtime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is easy to apply and it gets absorbed easily. No issues using makeup on top of it if applied in the morning. Leaves skin soft. Not greasy. I feel like I saw some improvement in the appearance of fine wrinkles in several weeks, but nothing drastic in my case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh gifted me this product. However, all opinions are my own.  I have always liked Fresh products and this one is no different. I love how creamy and thick the product is and it melts into your skin so quickly. It does not leave you feeling like you have anything on. Unfortunately, i have not used this product long enough to really see a difference in my skin, but Iu2019m still enjoying it, nevertheless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love fresh products and this moisturizer did not disappoint. Itu2019s extremely thick and moisturizing and doesnu2019t leave the skin feeling dry or oily. I found that it melted right into my skin. Perfect nighttime moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging as always from this brand. The moisturizer has a slight scent but itu2019s not extremely strong. I love this moisturizer it makes my skin feel hydrated and wear great under makeup. Overall itu2019s great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve noticed results immediately. I use it as a night moisturizer, but can be used both morning/night. Love this brand and purchased with the tea elixir. MAGIC!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face cream! It goes on so smoothly and hydrates without leaving me greasy at all. I love using it overnight and waking up with super smooth, glowy, hydrated skin. Highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this amazing moisturizer from fresh! It is incredible for anti-aging and helps keep my skin feeling bouncy and youthful. Definitely recommend for my dry skin friends who need a new moisturizer!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great product. Leaves my skin feeling great and hydrated. And it also smells so good. Easy to apply no oily feel. And for acne prone skin, this was fantastic. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for weeks now and I love it! It smells so fresh and is very very moisturizing! I will absolutely continue to buy this. Itu2019s not too heavy and makes my skin feel smooth all day! Makes my makeup go on smooth too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cream for anti aging! I have been using this for over a month now and I have noticed the wrinkles on my forehead have been less noticeable. Overall I have noticed my skin looks more plump and fresh since using the cream! Gifted by Fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s become a solid part of my daily face routine. Goes well underneath my primer/makeup. Light to no scent. Feels amazing first thing in the morning when my skin needs some waking up. Definitely feels like my skin is smoother since using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a very light pleasant scent. Itu2019s a thin cream that absorbs quickly. Itu2019s a bit watery so I like to mix it before applying it to my face. I apply it morning and night and it makes my face feed moisturized and nice. I recommend this cream for people over 35 years of age.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh gifted me this product for my honest review. I have been using this moisturizer for a couple of weeks and I think it's great! It sinks into my skin very well and absorbs very nicely. I love the texture of this cream for my almost 40 skin. It works so well especially in these winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favorite moisturizer. Itu2019s the perfect thickness and doesnu2019t leave my skin oily. It also goes great under makeup. You donu2019t need a lot and I use to every morning after cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was gifted to me by Fresh Beauty. I expected to enjoy this cream mostly in the evening but it's light enough for daytime/everyday use. It has a nice, medium/light texture that's hydrating without being greasy. I could see myself using this in my regular routine if it weren't for the strong fragrance. The only thing that is offputting about it. It smells great; it's just way too strong. I hope Fresh dials it back a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this cream melts into my skin . Not only is the fragrance so refreshing but itu2019s cooling too . I like to use this for my nighttime routine to make sure I get the full benefits of fine lines and wrinkles . My skin feels real rejuvenated , hydrated and fresh after just one try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I look forward to doing my nighttime skincare routine now! I am obsessed with Fresh products as I can feel the difference in my skin immediately after using their products. I only need a tiny bit for my entire face, this will last you forever!

reviews.review_title: Much better than a retinol based moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this cream that's supposed to have retinol-like effects without using a different brand's retinol after a retinol serum ended up burning my skin.    This was a much better experience and left my skin soft and supple instead of burned.  It seemed like my skin was a bit firmer as well.  As of now I don't have any defined wrinkles, but this did help smooth out some of the fine lines I have.  I'll definitely keep using this to prevent wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted but had been on my wishlist for a long time. So happy I finally was able to try it! I love incorporating this into my nightly routine. Itu2019s texture is super nourishing and I like to layer it over my serums. In the mornings my skin feels plump and perfectly moisturized. Iu2019m excited to see some longterm benefits.

reviews.review_title: Fresh has been killing it lately with skincare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You'll love this cream if you enjoy the fragrance of tea! The cream is rich yet not sticky. Fresh has been killing it lately with skin & bodycare, and this cream's texture is no exception. I can see myself wearing this as the last step of skincare all year long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good moisturizer. It's has a pretty thick consistency, so you end up using quite a bit of it but it results in a very soft and moisturized skin! Helps with firmness and fine lines really well! Love it so much !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been a huge fan of fresh, and this product did not disappoint. I was gifted this product from fresh. The texture is great and I think it's perfect for the winter time. The product also smells great, which is always a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream leaves my skin so soft even after I wakes up. I am 42 almost 43, told how great my skin is daily especially since adding this to my routine. I have combo skin-dry around my cheeks and normal everywhere

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin gets very dry during winter, I have combination skin and during this season I get dry patches, this cream has kept my skin smooth without the need of oils, it also plumps my skin, and absorbs quite fast

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great anti aging cream that visible hydrate and firm skin. It has a creamy texture that feels lightweight and gentle on my sensitive skin. Packed with amazing ingredients too. Me and my husband both are loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream is a really lovely texture- I love how rich it feels on my face. The scent is different- almost a bitu2026peppery? I donu2019t think my results were as dramatic as the description and the price seem to suggest. I love the inclusion of ceramides and squalane.   Gifted by fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been obsessed with fresh products for so long now . Their products are so amazing and I was so excited to try their newest product. It makes my skin so hydrated and help with fine lines and hydrating my skin

reviews.review_title: A must have in skin routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Fresh This Black Tea Advanced Age Renewal Cream doesn't burn my skin. I have pretty sensitive skin and it gets very dry during the winter. I'm starting my 30s and fine lines are a concern I'm starting to have, I love the texture of it and I like that it's not greasy. I apply it at night and when I wake up my skin is not dry at all and Iu2019m so in love of how smooth it makes it feel all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love fresh products bi have dry skin and this has helped my fine lines and wrinkles and also my dry skin. I think fresh products are made with high quality ingredients and that everyone needs to try them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the black tea cream complimentary from fresh beauty! I really loved this product the texture is just so lovely just like the other fresh products just on par with the whole brand. I canu2019t wait to keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product! As a lightweight, visibly age-defying cream, it had a retinol-like performance from its key ingredient, BT Matrixm. It was perfect for my skin type, and it truly addressed all of my skincare concerns such as fine lines and wrinkles, dullness, and loss of firmness and elasticity. The cream is gentle enough for sensitive skin, and I was impressed by the clinical results, which showed significant improvement in the appearance of wrinkles, firmness, and radiance. I also loved that it was suitable for all skin types. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, dullness, and loss of firmness and elasticity. Complimentary from Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Beauty gifted me this product in exchange for an honest review. And I am loving this Black Tea Age Renewal Cream. It is hydrating, absorbs nicely into the skin and leaves behind a nice, matte finish. Plus, it has a pleasant smell and is perfect for these drying winter months. I recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Fresh This Black Tea Anti-Aging Ceramide Moisturizer is lightweight, creamy, and absorbs into the skin so nicely. This high-performance face cream reduces the look of deep-set wrinkles while visibly improving firmness and radiance.

Fresh Age Renewal Cream leaves my skin feel so smooth and plump. I love how moisturized my skin feels after using it. I put the cream on before bed and wake up to my skin still feeling hydrated the next morning. #giftedbyfresh

I've been using this moisturizer for about a week now. I really like it. I think it has made a slight difference in my skin. It's very moisturizing, doesn't leave my skin oily. There is a slight smell to it which I don't mind but if someone is sensitive to scents then I wouldn't recommend. This was complimentary from Fresh.

Fresh is one of my favorite skincare brands, I already use The lotus daily moisturizer during the day and now this black tea at night. I am absolutely OBSESSED! The clean feels so thick and light, it smells incredible. I apply it as the last step at night along with the black tea eye cream which is a power duo! My skin health has improved so much, it looks so radiant and supple. I have noticed overall improvement in my skins texture and dark spots too which is a plus. This product was complimentary from fresh.

Fresh was one of the first prestigious skincare brands I tried and I always come back to them. The black tea scent is so comforting and not too overwhelming, it made my skin look so plump and hydrated and paired well with the resilience serum.

Such a great winter moisturizer! This is very thick and creamy, and feels super nourishing and comfortable at the end of my winter routine. As someone with oily skin, this will probably be too heavy in the summer, but Iu2019m enjoying it a lot. It smells like other Fresh products - a light herbal rose scent.

I am already a fan of Fresh Skincare and was so excited to try this moisturizer. I have sensitive, oily skin and have to be careful when it comes to moisturizers. This black tea cream is rich and nourishing but not too heavy for my skintype with a light, natural tea scent that does not irritate my skin. Gifted by Fresh.

This age renewal cream I was not sold at first says its anti wrinkle, firming and adds radiance to the skin. Wow after just 1 week of using this I am seeing a difference in my skin. I notice the line between my eyebrows is not as deep as it was a week ago. Gifted by Fresh

I love this moisturizer! Iu2019m a long time fan of fresh product and I have to say my favorite part of this cream is the natural tea scent. Itu2019s so calming and refreshing to me. This is also a nice thick cream that leaves my fave feeling plum and hydrated

I was gifted this product by Fresh Beauty for my honest review. This face cream is meant to reduce deep set wrinkles , improve firmness, and increase skin radiance. While I donu2019t yet have deep set wrinkles, I did notice an improvement in my smile crows feet - they were less noticeable to me. My skin did seem like it was a bit more youthful - like in my early 20s (probably thanks to those ceramides) - so that was fun. I personally love the smell of this cream and while I have combo skin, the thickness of the cream did not make my skin feel weighed down or icky. It was actually perfect!

reviews.review_title: Immediately saw a difference in my skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh gifted me this. Iu2019m a huge fan of Fresh so was super excited to try this out. It did not disappoint! Iu2019ve been using it for weeks now and Iu2019m starting to see progress in my fine lines. Like my face legit looks smoother and plumper. My new holy grail.

Two weeks ago, I was gifted by Fresh the new Black Tea Age Renewal Cream Review + B&A, and I really like it!!!   I am a rare and severe cancer survivor, and everyone who has experienced chemotherapy knows how damaging it is to your skin.   I am constantly looking for things that would assist in restoring the moisture and firmness to my face, which this cream does!  First and foremost, the texture is incredible, leaving my skin feeling radiant and silky. I'm 38 years young, and I'm just now getting into skincare (I know, a bit late), so this product was a no-brainer.   What I like most about this is the smell. I like scents that are light and not overbearing, and this one fits the bill! This product may be used during the day, at night, or both. I've been using this as my night cream and have seen a significant improvement in the fine wrinkles I had before using this product. It's as though the little creases had filled in some way.   I also observed that the dark patches on my face (from previous breakouts) have swiftly lightened and are practically GONE! This is a new take on retinol as this is much more gentle on the face.  This is defiantly much safe on your pillowcases when applying this to your face at night. I promise you won't wake up with bleached pillowcases. This is pillowcase-approved, LOL.  I will undoubtedly become a repeat customer!
This moisturizer feels incredible on my skin! Every time I use it my texture is nonexistent and my skin feels so supple & smooth. I like wearing this as my night cream! This was gifted by Fresh.

I received this cream complimentary from Fresh. This cream has a very mild pleasant earthy scent. The cream applies really easily and doesnu2019t feel heavy on my skin. My skin feels super soft and I feel a bit of a thigh tending or lifting effect from using this cream.

reviews.review_text: Last year, these guys delivered on the Tea Elixir serum so I was beyond excited to receive a jar of the brand new Black Tea Advanced Age Renewal Cream complimentary from Fresh. And in light of full disclosures, while the Black Tea range has quite a few of my favorites, I was never a fan of the Corset Cream. This one, however, is absolutely brilliant. It has perfectly creamy (medium-weight in my opinion) texture, glides on over my water-based serums like a dream and delivers ample moisture both AM or PM. Impressive ingredients include Ceramide NP, Rambutan (part of the brand's trademark complex which mimics many benefits of traditional retinol sans irritation), Squalane, and antioxidants. There is a faint aroma reminiscent of the iconic soy cleanser, but perhaps a bit more mild. My skin is looking rather glowy ever since I incorporated this newness into my routine. Very very happy with this launch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to this product complimentary from Fresh beauty, Iu2019ve found my new favorite moisturizer. While Iu2019ve always loved Fresh as a brand, itu2019s been a while since Iu2019ve invested in a luxury moisturizer. When I tell you this moisturizer is luxurious, Iu2019m not just referring to the cost. Letu2019s break it down:  Ingredients: Fresh is a clean beauty brand, so I can feel good about using it in my daily routine. For this moisturizer specifically it includes BT Matrix which is like retinol, but is *not* retinol. This is important for me because I am nursing (retinol is not recommended for those who are pregnant or nursing).  As Iu2019ve ventured through post partum and my early thirties, I need a moisturizer that can even my skin, address aging concerns, and is gentle. This delivers on all counts plus some.  Fragrance: A nice, light, floral and citrus scent that is not overpowering and dissipates quickly.   Texture: At first it seems like this moisturizer would be thick and heavy. Itu2019s not. While it is rich, it is not oily or sticky and does not leave a film on your skin. It wears beautifully under makeup and spreads easily.  Results: I feel that this moisturizer has helped tremendously in a short period of time. The photos included are a 5 day difference. It has reduced redness and has even helped alleviate a breakout. When I put it in I feel that my pores are smaller, fine lines arenu2019t as noticeable, and I truly glow. I feel radiant and beautiful when I put it on. Having a moisturizer that I can wear with or without makeup that makes me smile when I look in the mirror is a huge deal for a busy mom like myself.  Invest in this as soon as possible. You wonu2019t be disappointed.

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Fresh.   We all know the benefits of tea when consumed and Iu2019m glad itu2019s making itu2019s way over to skincare as well! This retails for $95 which is steep BUT considering it promises to have benefits that replace the retinol in your skincare, I think this will be a good buy if youu2019re in the market for a new moisturizer! I do wonder if I have a mild allergy to something in this product (fragrance blend, perhaps?)  I noticed the reviews are torn between the scent being strong vs light. I think this depends on how used to fragrance you are. I have gone mostly fragrance-free, and as such, it seems stronger to me. If youu2019re used to fragrance, I think you might deem the scent light.  Honestly, I think this is a product to sample before purchasing in order to see if the scent/texture will work out for you. reviews.review_text: There hasn't been a product from FRESH I've tried that I haven't liked. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received the Fresh Black Tea Age-Delay Cream gifted by Fresh and I have been thoroughly impressed with its performance. The cream has a luxurious, silky texture that glides on smoothly and absorbs quickly into the skin. It has a subtle, pleasant scent and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and rejuvenated. One of the standout ingredients in this cream is the black tea ferment, which is known for its powerful antioxidant properties. It helps to protect the skin from environmental stressors and promotes a more youthful-looking complexion. The formula also contains hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, which work together to improve skin texture and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Overall, I highly recommend the Fresh Black Tea Age-Delay Cream to anyone looking to improve the appearance of their skin. Its combination of nourishing ingredients and delightful texture make it a pleasure to use on a daily basis.

reviews.review_text: This luxurious and lush moisturizer feel so amazing on the skin. It instantly soothes the skin and adds a boost of hydration! It has a wonderful very subtle fresh scent, nothing synthetic or displeasing about this scent and it fades quickly. This formula sinks into the skin really well but it still leaves a nice veil of moisture on the skin that maintains moisture on the skin. It makes my skin look instantly glowing and plumps out any fine lines. Over time, I find that this formula makes my skin more elastic, healthier, smoother, and stronger! It pairs so well with the rest of my routine and it eve works well under makeup. This is definitely a formula I love and highly recommend! Gifted by Fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new moisturizer does wonders at hydrating my bone-dry, sensitive skin. It has a slight fragrance to it that smells kind of like a sweet yet earthy/botanical tea - I enjoy it, however would like it more if the fragrance was omitted. It does not negatively impact the user experience, although for me it does not enhance it either. I live in a humid environment (south Florida), and still do not find this product to feel heavy after applying. It goes on thick, but thins out once it starts to absorb and feels ultra hydrating. All in all I am really enjoying it, although I can say I have notice much of a physical difference in the appearance of my skin that would justify (at least in my mind) the $95 price point. At that price, I would really like to see more clinically-effective actives. If you have money to spend, Iu2019d say this is an excellent every day moisturizer for individuals with very dry skin like mine.  Gifted By Fresh *

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Fresh. Letu2019s chat about Fresh Beauty and their newly launched Black Tea Advanced Age Renewal Cream. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh Black Tea Advanced Age Renewal Cream gifted by fresh has been a treat for my oily/combination skin. The cream is extremely moisturizing and can be used morning and evening. My skin has been looking very glowing and plumped through this winter cold. I have noticed an improvement in my dark spots, and smoothing of wrinkles around my forehead and smile lines. This cream is gentle enough for sensitive skin. Make sure to wear sunscreen in the daytime (this product does not contain retinol but wear your spf). I apply this cream as the last step in my skincare routine (before spf) and at night. It leaves my skin smooth, supple, and hydrated the next day!
